ModMetaData.name: RePower Android Tiers Patch
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Patches Android Tiers utilities for using the RePower system:
Robotics production casket (10W Idle, 1000W Active) Android Implants workbench (10W Idle, 700W Active) Android parts workbench (10W Idle, 700W Active)
Support-chat here: https://s.team/chat/KUDuzMGR
